name: External-storage-manager
tagline: Indicator for extract external drives at elementary OS
body:
### Description
This is a simple indicator build for [elementary OS](elementaryos.org), this app allows you to extract or unmount your external drives easily.

### Installation
You have to add my ppa and before install it.

```
sudo add-apt-repository ppa:jlnavarro111/jlnavarro111
sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install external-storage-manager
```

### Bug reports
If you find some bug please, report it at https://bugs.launchpad.net/external-storage-manager

### Blueprints
If you miss some feature, add a new blueprint at https://blueprints.launchpad.net/external-storage-manager
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
